text.div:
Health NZ language Value Set

https://nzhts.digital.health.nz/fhir/ValueSet/healthnz-language-value-set

This valueset can be used for the collection of languages spoken by patients and providers. It contains the full set of ISO 639-2 language codes. It also contains ISO 639-3 codes for Cantonese(yue), Mandarin(cmn) and New Zealand Sign language (nzs) as these languages are commonly recorded by health providers in New Zealand. To request other ISO 639-3 codes to be added to the valueset contact standards@tewhatuora.govt.nz.
